QueryDefinition.Query: select a.patid as person_id, a.admidate as condition_start_date, a.discharged as condition_end_date, ICD_PRIMARY as condition_source_value, 38000183 as condition_type_concept_id, a.spno as visit_occurrence_id, replace(replace(a.ICD_PRIMARY,'-',''),'.','') source_value from HES_primary_diag_hosp a JOIN _chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND a.patid = ch.PERSON_ID where a.admidate is not null
